question_stem.en: A 48-year-old woman comes to the office 10 days after undergoing breast reduction surgery. She feels well overall and is taking acetaminophen as needed for pain control. Vital signs are normal. Examination of the breasts reveals intact surgical incisions without drainage; the incisions are pink, shiny, and slightly warm. The surrounding skin has mild edema but no erythema. Which of the following wound healing processes is most likely occurring at this time?
question_stem.zh: 一名48岁女性在接受缩乳手术10天后来到诊所就诊。她总体感觉良好，并根据需要服用对乙酰氨基酚来控制疼痛。生命体征正常。乳房检查显示手术切口完整，无引流；切口呈粉红色，有光泽，略微温暖。周围皮肤有轻度水肿但无红斑。以下哪种伤口愈合过程最有可能在此期间发生？

question.en: Which of the following wound healing processes is most likely occurring at this time?
question.zh: 以下哪种伤口愈合过程最有可能在此期间发生？

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of the phases of wound healing, specifically the proliferation phase and the process of angiogenesis. It requires understanding the timeline of wound healing and the cellular events occurring in each phase.

To solve this question, identify the time frame (10 days post-surgery) and correlate it with the appropriate phase of wound healing. Recognize that angiogenesis and proliferation of vascular endothelial cells are characteristic of the proliferation phase, which occurs approximately 3-5 days after injury.
summary.zh:
这个问题测试对伤口愈合阶段的了解，特别是增殖期和血管生成过程。它要求理解伤口愈合的时间表以及每个阶段发生的细胞事件。

要解决这个问题，确定时间范围（术后 10 天）并将其与伤口愈合的适当阶段相关联。认识到血管生成和血管内皮细胞增殖是增殖期的特征，增殖期大约在损伤发生后 3-5 天发生。

tags: Wound healing; Angiogenesis; Proliferation phase; Vascular endothelial cells; Collagen synthesis; Inflammation; Mast cells
